definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: This article Legionella disease related to recent research carried out on the preliminary.
sentences.chinese: 本文就軍團菌病有關研究近況進行了初步闡述。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the incidence of legionella pneumonia (LP) infection in children in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 目的監測上海地區兒童軍團菌感染情況。

sentences.english: But Legionella bacteria can cause a form of pneumonia in people with weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 但軍團菌在免疫力低下的人羣中會導致一種肺炎。

sentences.english: Conclusion People in Chengdu were generally infected with different serogroups of Legionella.
sentences.chinese: 結論成都地區普遍存在不同種型的軍團菌感染。

sentences.english: Legionella bacteria are among the top 3 causes of community-acquired pneumonias.
sentences.chinese: 軍團菌排在導致集體感染肺炎的前三位。
